item.title: Essay text loses formatting when published
item.description:
Hello all,
My essay http://www.kasperdemeulemeester.be/albums/all-too-human/ loses its paragraphs, italic font,... when I publish it. What am I doing wrong? When I open the essay part of the admin section, it looks perfectly alright.
Thanks a lot!
Kasper

item.title: Password protected essays
item.description:
Hello,
Would it be possible to implement the password protection for essays too? I use essays linked to album on my website, and if I protect an album the linked essay is still accessible.
Thank you

item.title: Please help, how do I make koken use a picture for an essay cover?
item.description: I have uploaded x number of pictures on an essay. When I hit publish, Koken picks a picture from a category seemingly at random and assigned it to that essay. I can't have another persons picture on an essay about a different person. But the only thing I could do was delete the wrong picture, and now I have a giant grey box for a picture instead of a picture of the family I'm blogging about. Can anyone please help?

item.title: Comments on albums
item.description:
How can i get allow comments on albums?
http://www.nassergazi.com/albums/adam-candice/

item.title: Remove dates on albums
item.description:
How can I remove the date posted beneath each picture on albums in the Axis 2 theme?
Thanks

item.title: Infinite scrolling on album
item.description:
How can get get rid of pagination of albums (infinite scrolling) ?
Thanks

item.title: Possible to add a blog
item.description:
Hi Koken team,
My site is craighullphotography.co.uk, and I wanted to get a blog page to come out as craighullphotography.co.uk/blog and be able to add a theme or at least HTML and CSS to it. How is this possible?
I know you have essays, which is great - and similar to blog posts, but i would really like the /blog ending and the ability to change it as I see fit (name, css, html, flow within my site etc).
Thank you
Craig

item.title: Change page url
item.description: Hi! Is there a way to change a page URL from fotokrafie.at/pages/contact to fotokrafie.at/contact? And why do links to extern in my pages (for example on fotokrafie.at/pages/contact) do not count for SEO checkers like seorch.de as link to extern? Thanks, Katharina

item.title: breadcrumbs - Navigation to retrace back to Album, Set ?
item.description:
Is there a way to have a good breadcrumb trail in the Madison 2 theme ? I have Sets & Albums.
When I open an image in an album, there is a link which leads back to the album - but there is no link which leads the album back to the set.
e.g: http://www.pappy.ch/roberthuber/koken/sets/projects-1/
I am new to Koken and have just started setting it up. It seems like a great tool, I would very much like to find out if there is a way to use a more logical navigation for those links to "go back",
Thanks for advice,
Robert

item.title: Essay Formatting
item.description:
I've written and added my first essay.
When I view the essay page, it displays the essay title, and the entire essay its'self in the body. Clicking on the essay does the same thing.
On the primary essay page, is there a way to format it so it displays other information such as the date published and only a few lines of the essay?

item.title: add 'essays' to an 'album'
item.description:
Hi.
I'd like to be able to place an essay within an album. So, the process would be: write / publish an essay. Assign it a Topic. Set "Published" date to control the order.
Then have it magically appear between photos - in the right order (according to date or manual order).
That would allow me to annotate my gallery with essays about my photos and such, and have this appear directly within an Album or Set.
Anything like this on the horizon? Until then, I can't really see any use for 'Essays'. Is there a list of published sites using Koken I could review and try to learn from?

item.title: Essays
item.description: How to save essays? Please advise!

item.title: Edit read more label
item.description: I've edited and changed the read more label in essays to German "weiterlesen" . That works on the essays page but not for the featured essays on the home page, here it allways writes "more" and the quick info shows "Read [essay name]". How can that be changed in theme Repertoire? Thanks for any hint.

item.title: Error in google calender enbed
item.description: I am trying to embed the google calendar in text draft page, in draft it looks fine, but after closing the page when I re open it, the calendar looks list like a blank square... what to do?

item.title: Lightbox Settings
item.description: How to modify parameters of a slideshow of the built in lightbox? (duration, transition)

item.title: Essay & Pages not working
item.description:
Hello,
When i try to make a essay/page to add some text it seems to be not working. I click on the + bottom left of the admin page it gives up a pop up where it asks for page title. When added and then click to proceed it says page/essay saved but nothing shows up. Nor can i add text to the page it simple does not show up at all.
link to my page if that helps: http://project-ghost.hisevilness.com/

item.title: Madison 2 / navigation issue
item.description:
Hi
i am using madison 2.
Everything is working great, except: I can't open the set "Japan" on the navigation. The others are single albums. If i use "open in new tab" i can see the albums and it works.
Thanks for your help
ming

item.title: Text at beginning of album
item.description: I want to display a text page as the first page in an album. (an artist's statement explaining the work about to be viewed) I would like to have the album (with it's chosen cover image) still visible on my albums page (which is my home page). Any suggestions on how to set this up?

item.title: Increase Image size in Essay
item.description: Hi can someone tell me how i can publish larger images than the default in essays? Thank you

item.title: image float in text
item.description:
What I missing in this is the possibilty in settings to set a image float. Yes I know I can do that with html but I think this has te be a base option in the script.
Any way this script rocks. Have used so many but this one is the best!!

item.title: Password Protection for Essays
item.description:
Hi,
is there a possibility to protect Essays for a closed user group? (Password Protect)
Best Regards, Rolf

item.title: How to put pictures into columns
item.description: I am using the Elementary theme and on my album pages I would like the pictures to be displayed in 3 columns rather than 1. However the CSS I have tried has not been successful, is there anything you can recommend?

item.title: Blog
item.description:
Hello,
Is it possible to change this name "ESSAYS" to "Blog"?
Please chech the attached photo to better understand what I am referring to: Download link https://we.tl/MeYeWihg66

item.title: https with .htaccess
item.description:
Hello !
I am setting up a family page, that should only be accessed by friends. So I am securing the page access with a user / password using an .htaccess file. While creating the page .htaccess was not active. After I finished the page I enabled the check. Now some albums show an empty page (browser cache completely deleted). Could this be related of securing with the site with .htaccess and how could I overcome this problem?
For testing purpose I removed .htaccess again, but I have the same issue. Some albums show only an empty page. While on the admin / site page, everything is fine. But the problem also occurrs if I call "View page" from the admin page.
Do you have a hint what I can do?
Thanks and best regards, Uwe
P.S. Pictures have been populated using the ligthroom plugin.

item.title: Blog
item.description:
Hello,
I would love to create a blog that will be in my website itself in order to get a better traffic and improve my SEO. What would be the best way to do that and what are your recommendations? I currently use Boulevard 2 Koken Theme. This is my website: www.plamenpanchev.com I would love to create an interesting looking blog and the ability to be shared easily + other people to have an option to comment bellow every post. How can I do that? Also organized with a date/timeline that would be from the now moving to the past. I have some blog post from the past because I moved from another website but how can I organize and post my old blog posts as well with dates from the previous years?
I kind of like the blogs of another theme called Oxygen but is there a way that I can creates something similar if I use Boulevard 2 Theme? Examples: https://varoystrand.se/artiklar/ https://ingmarwein.com/index.php?/blog/
What would you recommend me to do in order to great successful and gorgeous-looking blog?
With Much Love and Great Respect! Plamen

item.title: chastain
item.description: How can I show a cover of my essays on the fron page like I can show covers of my albums? I only can make a link to this part of my website (have a look: http://www.abele-photography.com)

item.title: essay
item.description:
I have been trying Elementary, Ensemble, Madison 2 and Oxygen. My essays look fine in draft form; but when I go to the site with these themes and view published essays, they shows error messages:
"Warning: include(tags/IntlDateFormatter.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /home/...........koken/app/site/site.php on line 1173"
"Warning: include(): Failed opening 'tags/IntlDateFormatter.php' for inclusion (include_path='.:/usr/local/lib/php:/usr/local/php5/lib/pear') in ....."
I am a photographer and know nothing about lower level codes or languages. How can I fix the "errors" and have a restored site? Thanks

item.title: how te create the post under the big picture (at Home) in the Repertoire theme
item.description: hello, how do i create the 4 post (nycityskype / alaska / jerusalem / music) under the big picture in this example? hope you can help me. thanks! greetings mirjam

item.title: Embeding iFrame Code
item.description:
I am having endless problems trying to embed an iFrame into a page that will add a shopping cart page to my koken website.
I can add the code ok using the code option and everytime I do this the page will load correctly... but only that one time.... every refresh thereafter loads the page but it does not display correctly, it only displays a few line from the top of the page.
I'm at a loss as to why it does this and despite trying various different things I haven't been able to get it to stop doing this.
Can you help?
http://www.fascinatinglight.photography/

item.title: Blog
item.description:
Hello,
I would love to create a blog that will be in my website itself in order to get a better traffic and improve my SEO. What would be the best way to do that and what are your recommendations? I currently use Boulevard 2 Koken Theme. This is my website: www.plamenpanchev.com I would love to have an interesting looking blog and the ability to be shared easily + other people to have an option to comment bellow every post. How can I do that? Also organized with a date/timeline that would be from the now moving to the past. I have some blog post from the past because I moved from another website but how can I organize and post my old blog posts as well with dates from the previous years?
I kind of like the blogs of another theme called Oxygen but is there a way that I can creates something similar if I use Boulevard 2 Theme? Examples: https://varoystrand.se/artiklar/ https://ingmarwein.com/index.php?/blog/
With Much Love and Great Respect! Plamen

item.title: Lightbox issue when opened from essay (again)
item.description:
Hi, I have the exact same problem than the one describe by Carsten
what I have : A lightbox opened from an essay will display whatever is in my public content, even if I assigned as 'topic' an album created specifically to contain the images for this post
what I expect : the lightbox should loop through the images *contained in the post* no more no less, and show them in the order they are inserted in the post
how are koken:previous and koken:next determined ?
my koken is up to date with Madison 2 theme URL to test the issue : https://www.perspectives.photo/blog/2017/01/seance-cocooning-au-mas-de-lafeuillade-a-montpellier/

item.title: modify theme
item.description:
Hello, I was just wondering if, with the Repertoire theme, an option was available to keep the "essays" column on every page?
Quentin

item.title: How do I specify an image to use through editing html?
item.description:
I'm trying to create a custom bio page and want to include an uploaded image at a certain size. The information you have in your how-to docs talk about using something like however there's never a mention of where the image actually resides on my system. I see the uploaded image refered to in [koken_upload filename="my-image.jpg" label="my-image.jpg"] but this is outside the koken:img tag and so I cannot specify the file size.
I don't want to create a whole new theme for just one bio page. It would be nice to have some documentation showing how to use css and the koken tags to control just a single page.

item.title: Sometime Essays won't show up on my page
item.description:
Hi, if I don't update Essays (add some new posts, updates etc.) then Essays page is empty to the viewers. Not sure why this happens, tried cleaning cache and so, also changed an hosting etc. and I still have the same problem for quite some time... my site http://vedranpapes.from.hr/
Best regards, Vedran

item.title: Images not in Content?
item.description: I have set up an essay, mainly consisting of a list of images, added to that page. However, I can't find the images in the library. Where are the pictures? -Mino

item.title: Page title on contact page
item.description:
I'm sure there's a simple solution to this that I've been banging my head on the wall for a few hours now.
I created a contact page, named Contact. The page name comes up in the body of the contact page (Seen here: http://sok.al/pages/contact/). How do I stop the page name from displaying on the contact page?

item.title: Image embedded in page
item.description: I'm trying to create an 'About Me' page. I understand I can add media to the page, but I would like an image to be displayed above my text content without the user having to interact with the image title. How do I do this?

item.title: Changing URL
item.description:
In the text tab all my URLs start with /essays/etc.
How do I change the "essays" to something else?

item.title: Tagcloud
item.description: Is there a way to create a tagcloud instead of the default plain taglist?

item.title: Adding contact form is not possible
item.description: I don't have that symbol of an envelope in my quick-bar when I click into a field.

item.title: Lightbox issue when opened from essay
item.description: In all my essays I place a picture which on click shows the linked album in the lightbox. Other than opening the lightbox from the album page the numbering is missing here. Further with my last essay the sorting order in the lightbox is garbled and even shows images from a different album. What's going wrong here?

item.title: Multiple Essay PAges
item.description:
Hi,
I was wondering if it would be possible to have multiple Essay pages. e.g. one for the Actual travel and one page with all the conducted travels so far. I tried to have two essay pages but was not able to assigne essays to one or the other page. THX for the help. regards, Rolf

item.title: Edit Essay-URL
item.description:
Hi Koken team!
Thank you for what you are doing!
I have a couple of questions!
1. How can I change (edit) the URL for my finished essay? 2.How can I have a more clean structure in my Essaypage on my website? I do not want the people to scroll all my essays to find the right topic for them
3. Why is Koken not writing its own comment function for the essay? Koken is nearly perfect for an uncomplicated Portfolio or Website or Blog. Is there anybody still working on koken? I just want to know honestly.
Much Love to you guys!!!

item.title: Changing default alignment in Axxis 2 essays
item.description:
I want to change the default alignment for essays in the Axxis 2 theme to something other than "centered". It is possible to do this for pages via a setting, but apparently not for essays. Searching the Help Center here, I came up with this suggestion to add as custom CSS
article { text-align:justify; }
It unfortunately doesn't work for Axxis.
I am not a programmer by any stretch, but I would very much like to fix this issue, if possible. The site is www.pacificlight.ca
Thanks

item.title: Add image count to an essay or page
item.description: In a HTML page, I have a list of links to Koken tags. E.g. XYZ text Is there any way to insert a count of how many images are in that tag? If it's possible, I would like to see "XYZ test (123 images)".

item.title: Title disappeared
item.description: Hi my main title (in this case my name dissapeared) it is only seen when you are at home. clicking one category like about my Header (my name) dissapears. This happened adding a link on the site section.

item.title: pasting text is not possible
item.description: when i am writing an Essay with the Editor, i can write directly in the Editor, but it is not possible to paste a copied text from the simpe windows-Editor! it opens always the window "Begin typing, paste a url or click here to insert media or code" but nothing happens then. for me it is a big Problem, because i write my text with many different applications and want to copy/paste directly it to the koken-editior. what shall i do? best regards ronny

item.title: edit page content
item.description:
how do I do that ? I only can add one item(text) and thats it.. There is no box appearing to add more our other content? My cursor seems to be stuck in the text ?
THx

item.title: Less than 10 items per page?
item.description: In the template settings of default theme (cones with installation) the minimum number of items per page is 10. How can i set the value to 9 to get the classic 3x3 image grid? Btw, koken is a really cool tool :)

item.title: "Repertoire" theme essay feed
item.description:
Hello,
We are currently using your "repertoire" theme for our organization's website. I was wondering if there was any to to have the essay feed on the left-hand side of the homepage (provided you are in 2-column mode) persist through all pages.
Thank you, Jake

item.title: Text editor
item.description:
Hi, I have some trouble to add images after adding text
also it's impossible de move picture up or down this is kind of stupid.
The text editor for the essay is very weak!!!!
Impossible de add columns ect...
You should make a better text editor for the next version.
cheers

item.title: RE: Essays page Vimeo media now no longer full width
item.description:
Hi all
Thanks to Rupert for investigating on this. I'm facing the same problem, my latest vimeo media are no longer full width. Can we expect a fix soon?
Andi

item.title: text formatting
item.description:
I am a bit terrified (i.e. disappointed) about the poor text formatting abilities in Axis (maybe in all other themes as well).
E.g. I can not • set different fonts (e.g. for subtitles, highlighting, image captions) • change the alignment e.g. to 'justified' or 'left aligned' etc.
might be that 'Axis' means 'centered'. But anyhow, I want to have my essays left-aligned or justified, e.g. to a limited text width of 750px. Can I assign my own css stylesheet to my theme to avoid working with this rudimentary text functions and will my styles appear in the list beneath 'paragraph / quote / code / H1 / H2 …' ?

item.title: Contact Form Sent Message issue
item.description:
Hi,
I'm hoping this is straightforward. I have a simple contact form on my site - www.brightonbowen.com/pages/contact-us/ - and when you hit send, the success message is displayed in white text, and it's on a white background :) I can't find any setting within Koken which shows white text as selected.
How can I change this, please?
thank you
kevin

item.title: Blog page unlisted
item.description:
Is there a way to create a blog/text page that is unlisted. ( that is not public, and that I can share the URL only when I want to )?
I found how to make an album unlisted but not a text page.
Thanks, Paul

item.title: Essays page Vimeo media now no longer full width
item.description:
It used to be that when I wrote essays and inserted a link to one of my Vimeo videos, they would span the full width of the essays column. (In Madison 2, this seems to be @ 800px) Now if you have a look, the grey media box spans correctly, but the video view port does not:
http://www.noir.net/essays/
The funny thing is that I set a number of my Vimeo videos to a Favorites category, and built a page that looks great:
http://www.noir.net/vimeo/
The Essays page used to look so nice. Now, not so much. Any ideas?
Many thanks in advance,
- Rupert

item.title: Missing Images at Essays Overview
item.description:
Dear Koken,
I reallly like your CMS System. It is the best one for photographs. Now I have a little Problem with the essays Overview. The CMS don't show me the pictures, whitch are inserted before the readmore link.
At the beginning it has waorked, but now not.
Here is the Website.
https://kerstinbittner.de/blog/ Please can you help me. It is really importent for our Website.
Your
Moritz

item.title: double image at the end of the post
item.description:
Hi. Could anyone know a reason why a last image in a blog post is now getting displayed twice?
http://www.magiafotografii.pl/essays/2016/07/magda-i-milosz-czerwcowe-kolorowe-zdjecia-slubne/
http://www.magiafotografii.pl/essays/2016/07/magda-i-milosz-lipcowe-kolorowe-zdjecia-slubne/
I tried two times. No any custom codes has been made
Regards Paul

item.title: Essays border/frame
item.description:
I wonder if someone can help. I understand how to use CSS but need a little help with exactly how to do the following.
I would like to add some kind of border around each essay in the Essays/Blog page, to help delineate each essay from the others.
Can someone help me with the CSS that would be needed to add some kind of border, either a thin line or shadow.
http://www.fascinatinglight.photography/blog/
many thanks

item.title: changing "about me" page on website
item.description: How do I edit and change the about me page on my website?

item.title: Include content, which has not been published yes into essay
item.description:
Hello,
I imported several images into my library planning to use them in an essay. I already added titles and tags so I already put some work into it.
The pictures are in private state currently, because I don't want them to appear in Content or Timeline.
When trying to add the pictures to the essay it is not possible to include them (I guess because they are private). Is there a way to achieve that I can add the pictures from the library to the essay without changing them to public beforehand?
Thank you
Sebastian

item.title: Page Break only after 10 Essays
item.description:
Hey Guys,
is there an option to set the max. number of items for Essays? I use the theme "elementary". I build a site that show only essays. Now there were only 10 Essays per page.
If i build a site for albums there is a slider for the "number of items". It is possible to change the number of essays per page?
Thanks for help.
regards,

item.title: Logo
item.description:
Hi,
The problem I am having is to do with the positioning of my site name/logo on the contact page. For some reason the positioning changes in comparison to all other pages.
I have set up the contact page as a text page where as the others are normal image pages, I have a feeling this might be why the title/logo is changing position.
Any help would be much appropriated.
The theme I am using is "Boulevard" and links to my homepage and contact page below:
http://emcn.co.uk/ & http://emcn.co.uk/pages/contact/
Thanks in advance.
Ed

item.title: Nested Menue
item.description:
Hi, I'm new to Koken and struggle with the "nested pages" function of the Madison-2 theme. I want to have plain text pages nested in an "about" menu (like on http://pixelstory.ca, which is also built with Koken Madison-2).
I turn on the "nested" function in the Theme menu, but then I don't see any add link within a set or page. What do I do wrong?
Best Joerg

item.title: Unlisted album an essays
item.description:
Hello, I try to insert photos from an unlisted album, and I din't suceed. Can you help me? Thank you
J-C

item.title: renaming the label "essay" doesn't work correctly
item.description:
Hello,
I renamed the label "essays / essay" into "Beiträge / Beitrag". In the navigation menu of my site it was inherited correctly, but in the bottom of a single post (e.g. www.schelagowski.de/beitraege/workshop-fotografie-people-outdoor/) and in the rss feed link it still calls "essays". Should I rename a label somewhere else? I'm using the regale 2 theme and the latest koken version.
Regards, Thomas

item.title: Pages and changes to pages don't get published or saved
item.description:
Hi I'm having a problem with a clients site. If I make changes to a page and publish these changes, they won't show on my live site. Nor does adding links in the navigation work. Everything looks good in Draft but when I check my Live website and go back to Draft, all the changes have disappeared.
I Also can't seem to update to a newer versions. Every time I try, I and it refreshes, the update message is still showing and Koken is still running on an older version. I have this problem with my own website as well.

item.title: how to sort Essays
item.description:
Hello,
I have a page showing all my featured essays,
I sort them manually in admin "text/featured essays" but on my website they appear in another order (last modified last). How can I change this?
thanks
Federico

item.title: remove "view all essays" link
item.description:
is it possible to remove the "view all essays" link at the end of all my essays?
I'm using koken with regale 2 theme
thank you!
Federico

item.title: How align header left on blog pages?
item.description: I don't like that Header 3 is centered on blog pages. How can I align it on left?

item.title: Photo in page
item.description: Hello I want to set a picture in to the text site and get the picture to the right and picture to the left. But i can't do that, what can i do? The picture is also big, see my homepage under CV: http://madsclausrasmussen.dk/pages/cv-1/

item.title: Pasting plain text + formatting
item.description:
Hello,
First things first: thanks for an amazing product. I can't really express how happy I was when I found Koken. Thanks!
I have one issue, though. When I paste plain text to the essay editor (e.g. from Evernote), it ignores all the blank lines. When I opent he HTML editor, I can see them, but they are not turned to paragraphs (...).
I understand that there is a ton of things to consider and this is probably a result of some compromise, etc., but I believe it would be very useful to either make this an option somewhere, or to add some special command to paste & format. It doesn't necessarily have to support rich formatting, but turning single breaks to and double breaks to would be super helpful.
Is there any other way to do this? I even considered creating an OS X action (for the context menu) to do this for me...
Thanks a lot for your reply.

item.title: Change information on the contact page of a website
item.description: Hi, Im updating a website for my manager. This website states telephone numbers and an address which are no longer valid. Im wondering how to change or delete these? Thanks

item.title: text menu
item.description:
Hello
I use the theme "elementary" I need to create the different menus that contain diifferenti text pages. If you use items "essays", each menu item contains the same essays. if you use items "pages" I can not enter the sub pages
how do I fix?
thank you angelo

item.title: How do I mke a "contact me"-page?
item.description:
Hi!
When I make a page, how do I move it Into I want to make a simple "contact me"-page, but i can't get it too work. I've tried making it as a page, but then I don't know how to link it to the "OM MIG + KONTAKT"-page. It worked when I did it as an essay, but then it didn't look like I wanted it to. (The picture is huge, there's no contact info etc). I want it to look like this, http://michaellarssen.de/pages/kontakt/ but also with a picture of me on it.
Thank you!
Maja

item.title: Center title of Essay in Regale 2
item.description: I can't seem to be able to center the essay titles.. tried css text-align: center but doesn't work. Any other tricks I could try? Thanks.

item.title: Turn off titel on a page as homepage
item.description:
Is there any possibility to turn off the title on a page assinged as homepage? I did it by css, but it isn't nice (see fotos.lobolmo.de) in the tab.
Or how could I change the title in the header?
Thanks Michael

item.title: Splash Page loads once, then not again until history/cache is cleared
item.description: Why? Is there a fix?

item.title: Video Background Splash Page
item.description:
Hi,
With koken it's possible to put a video on the website background in home page?

item.title: Pages content not displaying
item.description:
Dear support team,
The content of the page http://goldenhour.ch/pages/tarifs/ stopped showing, after changing the body text size.
It can be seen correctly on the pages admin section but does not show any content in the live preview or the online version.
Please threat this case as urgent, as an ad campaign is ongoing and this is the prices page.
Thank you, Best regards, MP

item.title: font formatting on my Links page
item.description:
I am having trouble with the formatting of text on my links page: http://www.arky.com/pages/links/
I have made all of the type use the header format, but when published it is all a jumble and not consistent. Can you have look at it to see what the problem is ?
Thanks, David

item.title: Essay date format
item.description:
Hi,
I've noticed that recently the date format on the essays pages of my site have changed. Previously they were seperated with a character (can't remember if it was a period, dash or hyphen), but now they are just displayed as a string of 8 numbers, which looks a bit poor.
Has there been an update to the template that has caused this? I've checked that I've not removed it using CSS, and I've not altered the template at all.
An example of this can be seen at the top of the following page: http://www.dannypaynephotography.com/blog/2016/02/tame-impala-manchester-arena-a-bold-step/

item.title: Columns in pages or essays
item.description:
Hello, is there any proper way to do column in pages or essays ?
I have try some basic technics like table and div, that work for basic thing like text but it is more difficult to have a good result when insert image.
I want to put image and text in 2 columns on the same line.
I need to do something like that : http://www.solennejakovsky.com/avis
Best regards

item.title: Essay Excerpt vs. Essay Content
item.description: Is it possible to write a koken:if/else/then statement in order to display only the {{essay.excerpt}} on the Essays page and display the {{essay.content}} on the individual essay posts? In short I am trying to show just a teaser text on the essays page and the full content in the essay. I thought about doing something in the info.json file but wasn't sure where to even start. Thanks.

item.title: Subcategoryes
item.description:
Hello.
I can`t find how to create a (sub)category, if it is possible. Subcategory for pages. Sample: _site.ru/pages/blog/page1 This is possible?
Thanks in advance for your reply.

item.title: How publish link on mainpage?
item.description:
Tell me please. I have created a page, but I can not figure out how to add a link in the menu.
Thanks in advance for your reply.
Screenshots: http://joxi.ru/Q2K0yZWI9qE5aA — page http://joxi.ru/52aROpGSGeqPnA — place for links

item.title: Image in Regale 2
item.description:
Hello,
Just a little bug, when i make essays, if i insert a picture (from library or not) this pictures is not show in essays, I show only the text. If i insert 2 or more pictures, they are all show correctly (first include).
I think it is a bug, i use regale 2 theme.
Best regards,

item.title: secret pages
item.description: can I publish a page that can be seen only by selected people ? I mean without giving my password and id to enter mywebsite console Thank you for answering

item.title: Add Images in single line
item.description:
Hi
i've a page where I would like to add more than one image in single line, I see when I click in new line i've an upload bar that I've to use if I want to upload my image with also a link but if I would like to add another image I've to do this in a new line.
How Can I insert more than one image in single line?

item.title: Re-ordering images in essays
item.description:
I would like to rearrange the order of images that I have placed in an essay. So for example to take the last to the first or add text in between two images.
Is there a difference between what can be done while in draft mode as compared to the esaay one it is published ?

item.title: Images in essays aren't inserted right when 100+
item.description:
Hi,
I actually love Koken, but now I want to embed 100+ images in an essay.
I can insert them and the first 100 pictures are showing correctly, the other/last ones are not, they look like duplicates of the last one.
You can see it here: http://florianvoigt.de/blog/2016/01/sri-lanka/ It's happening on all other themes too.
Can you help me?

item.title: Using Koken for a group of photographers
item.description:
Hi,
We are a group of amateur photographers, and we would like to create a new site to show our portfolios under one web site. I saw Koken, it seems a really nice CMS for photographers. I wonder if we can create multiple portfolios in one site using Koken? We plan to include 4 photographers in this site. Is this possible? Do you have a real site list that we can see?
Thanks in advance,
Best regards, Ercan

item.title: cannot see the text fileds
item.description:
Hi!
The contact form is not displayed properly! You cannot see the text fileds and the send button (all borders of fields are invisible...) http://riadhdridi.com/pages/contact/
Thank you !

item.title: Slideshow
item.description: Hi , how to see our pictures like that : http://www.emericfohlen.com/-/galeries/portfolio ? I mean we all images on one page and when you click the image it will open in full screen ? Thank you

item.title: Bug in Essays and Pages
item.description:
Hi,
I've recently updated my Koken to the latest version and I noticed that there is a bug going on with my Essays and Pages. All my published posts have retitled as "undefined" and when I open each of the post, it just shows a blank page.
At the bottom, it says that "Draft saved xx days ago" and when I click "Undo draft", it would restore the content of the post. However, when I try to save, it would not do anything, even if I made some changes.
Can you please check this out?
Thanks!

item.title: "View all Essay" instead "view all Blogs"
item.description:
Hello,
I renamed essay(s) into blog(s), but the link back to blog overview is still called "view all essay".
Is this a bug? As I can remember that this problem did not occur before.
Thanks
Andreas

item.title: How to change subject of contact form mails?
item.description:
Hey there,
I guess there must be some piece of code one can modify to change the subject of mails sent by the contact form, but I can't find it. Where do I have to look for it?

item.title: Possible to change text color?
item.description: Is it possible to format text color in an essay or page by clicking or is it necessary to change html manually?

item.title: Exporting Text
item.description: Is there a way to export text from Koken instead of having to go to each essay or page and copy from each one? Thanks!

item.title: Cannot update and Console error
item.description:
Hi Koken team,
I have installed koken and the CMS is really great and easy to use. However, I am somehow not able to update. I have changed the permission of the files to 777, but still no luck.
Recently I also got a console error when logging in, could this be connected? And is there a way to update and remove the console error?
I would like to hear from you,
Alieke
